meanings.definition: To surpass in bargaining or negotiating for a better deal.
meanings.sent1: She always outbargains her friends when shopping for clothes.
meanings.sent2: He outbargains the competition by offering lower prices.
meanings.sent3: The clever shopper outbargains the store owner and gets a great discount.
meanings.sent4: In the world of negotiation, he outbargains everyone with his skills.
meanings.sent5: Outbargains: the key to getting the best deals in town!

meanings.definition: To obtain a better deal through negotiation.
meanings.sent1: The customer outbargains the salesman and gets a discount on the car.
meanings.sent2: She always outbargains her way to getting the best prices.
meanings.sent3: The cat outbargains the dog for the last piece of meat.
meanings.sent4: His ability to outbargain his opponents makes him a successful businessman.
meanings.sent5: Outbargains can lead to great savings if done right.
